IssueSpecification.Name: Capital
IssueSpecification.Description: Capital credential issued by the Belastingdienst. It describes your capital as well as upper and lower bounds of your capital for a given year. You can have several of these credentials with different bounds.

Attribute.Name: year
Attribute.Description: The year this capital credential describes

Attribute.Name: capital
Attribute.Description: Your capital in the given year
